"type": "tool_result",
"content": " 1→import React, { useState, useEffect } from \"react\"\n 2→import { Box } from \"ink\"\n 3→import { StreamingText } from \"./StreamingText.js\"\n 4→import { ToolUse } from \"./ToolUse.js\"\n 5→import { eventToBlocks, type ContentBlock } from \"./eventToBlocks.js\"\n 6→\n 7→export const EventDisplay = ({ events }: Props) => {\n 8→ const [contentBlocks, setContentBlocks] = useState<ContentBlock[]>([])\n 9→\n 10→ useEffect(() => {\n 11→ // Filter to only show complete assistant messages, not streaming events\n 12→ // streaming events are incomplete and cause duplicate/disappearing content\n 13→ const assistantEvents = events.filter(event => event.type === \"assistant\")\n 14→\n 15→ // Group by message ID and merge content from all versions\n 16→ // The Claude CLI sends multiple snapshots of the same message as it builds up\n 17→ const messageMap = new Map<string, Array<Record<string, unknown>>>()\n 18→ for (const event of assistantEvents) {\n 19→ const message = event.message as Record<string, unknown> | undefined\n 20→ const messageId = message?.id as string | undefined\n 21→ const content = message?.content as Array<Record<string, unknown>> | undefined\n 22→\n 23→ if (messageId && content) {\n 24→ if (!messageMap.has(messageId)) {\n 25→ messageMap.set(messageId, [])\n 26→ }\n 27→ // Collect all content blocks from all versions\n 28→ messageMap.get(messageId)!.push(...content)\n 29→ }\n 30→ }\n 31→\n 32→ // Create merged events with all content\n 33→ const mergedEvents = Array.from(messageMap.entries()).map(([messageId, allContent]) => {\n 34→ // Deduplicate content blocks by their ID (for tool_use) or text (for text blocks)\n 35→ const seenBlocks = new Set<string>()\n 36→ const uniqueContent: Array<Record<string, unknown>> = []\n 37→\n 38→ for (const block of allContent) {\n 39→ const blockType = block.type as string\n 40→ let blockKey: string\n 41→\n 42→ if (blockType === \"tool_use\") {\n 43→ blockKey = block.id as string\n 44→ } else if (blockType === \"text\") {\n 45→ blockKey = `text:${block.text}`\n 46→ } else {\n 47→ blockKey = JSON.stringify(block)\n 48→ }\n 49→\n 50→ if "filePath": "/Users/herbcaudill/Code/HerbCaudill/ralph/src/components/EventDisplay.tsx",
"content": "import React, { useState, useEffect } from \"react\"\nimport { Box } from \"ink\"\nimport { StreamingText } from \"./StreamingText.js\"\nimport { ToolUse } from \"./ToolUse.js\"\nimport { eventToBlocks, type ContentBlock } from \"./eventToBlocks.js\"\n\nexport const EventDisplay = ({ events }: Props) => {\n const [contentBlocks, setContentBlocks] = useState<ContentBlock[]>([])\n\n useEffect(() => {\n // Filter to only show complete assistant messages, not streaming events\n // streaming events are incomplete and cause duplicate/disappearing content\n const assistantEvents = events.filter(event => event.type === \"assistant\")\n\n // Group by message ID and merge content from all versions\n // The Claude CLI sends multiple snapshots of the same message as it builds up\n const messageMap = new Map<string, Array<Record<string, unknown>>>()\n for (const event of assistantEvents) {\n const message = event.message as Record<string, unknown> | undefined\n const messageId = message?.id as string | undefined\n const content = message?.content as Array<Record<string, unknown>> | undefined\n\n if (messageId && content) {\n if (!messageMap.has(messageId)) {\n messageMap.set(messageId, [])\n }\n // Collect all content blocks from all versions\n messageMap.get(messageId)!.push(...content)\n }\n }\n\n // Create merged events with all content\n const mergedEvents = Array.from(messageMap.entries()).map(([messageId, allContent]) => {\n // Deduplicate content blocks by their ID (for tool_use) or text (for text blocks)\n const seenBlocks = new Set<string>()\n const uniqueContent: Array<Record<string, unknown>> = []\n\n for (const block of allContent) {\n const blockType = block.type as string\n let blockKey: string\n\n if (blockType === \"tool_use\") {\n blockKey = block.id as string\n } else if (blockType === \"text\") {\n blockKey = `text:${block.text}`\n } else {\n blockKey = JSON.stringify(block)\n }\n\n if (!seenBlocks.has(blockKey)) {\n seenBlocks.add(blockKey)\n uniqueContent.push(block)\n }\n }\n\n return {\n type: \"assistant\",\n message: {\n id: messageId,\n content: uniqueContent,\n },\n }\n })\n\n const blocks = mergedEvents.flatMap(event => eventToBlocks(event))\n setContentBlocks(blocks)\n }, [events])\n\n return (\n <Box flexDirection=\"column\" gap={1}>\n {contentBlocks.map(block =>\n block.type === \"text\" ?\n <StreamingText key={block.id} content={block.content} />\n : <ToolUse key={block.id} name={block.name} arg={block.arg} />,\n )}\n </Box>\n )\n}\n\ntype Props = {\n events: Array<Record<string, unknown>>\n}\n",

    "file": {
      "filePath": "/Users/herbcaudill/Code/HerbCaudill/ralph/src/components/eventToBlocks.ts",
      "content": "import { rel } from \"../lib/rel.js\"\nimport { shortenTempPaths } from \"../lib/shortenTempPaths.js\"\n\nexport type ContentBlock =\n  | { type: \"text\"; content: string; id: string }\n  | { type: \"tool\"; name: string; arg?: string; id: string }\n\nexport const eventToBlocks = (event: Record<string, unknown>): ContentBlock[] => {\n  if (event.type !== \"assistant\") {\n    return []\n  }\n\n  const message = event.message as Record<string, unknown> | undefined\n  const content = message?.content as Array<Record<string, unknown>> | undefined\n\n  if (!content) {\n    return []\n  }\n\n  const blocks: ContentBlock[] = []\n  const messageId = (message?.id as string | undefined) ?? \"unknown\"\n  let blockIndex = 0\n\n  for (const block of content) {\n    if (block.type === \"text\") {\n      const text = block.text as string | undefined\n      if (text) {\n        blocks.push({ type: \"text\", content: text, id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}` })\n      }\n    } else if (block.type === \"tool_use\") {\n      const input = block.input as Record<string, unknown> | undefined\n      const name = block.name as string\n\n      if (name === \"Read\") {\n        const filePath = input?.file_path as string | undefined\n        if (filePath) {\n          blocks.push({\n            type: \"tool\",\n            name: \"Read\",\n            arg: rel(filePath),\n            id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n          })\n        }\n      } else if (name === \"Edit\" || name === \"Write\") {\n        const filePath = input?.file_path as string | undefined\n        if (filePath) {\n          blocks.push({\n            type: \"tool\",\n            name,\n            arg: rel(filePath),\n            id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n          })\n        }\n      } else if (name === \"Bash\") {\n        const command = input?.command as string | undefined\n        if (command) {\n          blocks.push({\n            type: \"tool\",\n            name: \"$\",\n arg: shortenTempPaths(command),\n id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n })\n }\n } else if (name === \"Grep\") {\n const pattern = input?.pattern as string | undefined\n const path = input?.path as string | undefined\n blocks.push({\n type: \"tool\",\n name: \"Grep\",\n arg: `${pattern}${path ? ` in ${rel(path)}` : \"\"}`,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"Glob\") {\n        const pattern = input?.pattern as string | undefined\n        const path = input?.path as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"Glob\",\n          arg: `${pattern}${path ? ` in ${rel(path)}` : \"\"}`,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"TodoWrite\") {\n        const todos = input?.todos as Array<{ content: string; status: string }> | undefined\n        if (todos?.length) {\n          const summary = todos\n            .map(\n              t =>\n                `[${\n t.status === \"completed\" ? \"x\"\n : t.status === \"in_progress\" ? \"~\"\n : \" \"\n }] ${t.content}`,\n            )\n            .join(\"\\n    \")\n          blocks.push({\n            type: \"tool\",\n            name: \"TodoWrite\",\n            arg: \"\\n    \" + summary,\n            id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n          })\n        } else {\n          blocks.push({ type: \"tool\", name: \"TodoWrite\", id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}` })\n        }\n      } else if (name === \"WebFetch\") {\n        const url = input?.url as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"WebFetch\",\n          arg: url,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"WebSearch\") {\n        const query = input?.query as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"WebSearch\",\n          arg: query,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"Task\") {\n        const description = input?.description as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"Task\",\n          arg: description,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"Skill\") {\n        const skill = input?.skill as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({ type: \"tool\", name: \"Skill\", arg: skill, id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}` })\n }\n }\n }\n\n return blocks\n}\n",

\"unknown\"\n let blockIndex = 0\n\n for (const block of content) {\n if (block.type === \"text\") {\n const text = block.text as string | undefined\n if (text) {\n blocks.push({ type: \"text\", content: text, id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}` })\n }\n } else if (block.type === \"tool_use\") {\n const input = block.input as Record<string, unknown> | undefined\n const name = block.name as string\n\n if (name === \"Read\") {\n const filePath = input?.file_path as string | undefined\n if (filePath) {\n blocks.push({\n type: \"tool\",\n name: \"Read\",\n arg: rel(filePath),\n id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n })\n }\n } else if (name === \"Edit\" || name === \"Write\") {\n const filePath = input?.file_path as string | undefined\n if (filePath) {\n blocks.push({\n type: \"tool\",\n name,\n arg: rel(filePath),\n id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n })\n }\n } else if (name === \"Bash\") {\n const command = input?.command as string | undefined\n if (command) {\n blocks.push({\n type: \"tool\",\n name: \"$\",\n            arg: shortenTempPaths(command),\n            id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n          })\n        }\n      } else if (name === \"Grep\") {\n        const pattern = input?.pattern as string | undefined\n        const path = input?.path as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"Grep\",\n          arg: `${pattern}${path ? \"unknown\"\n let blockIndex = 0\n\n let textBuffer = \"\" // Accumulate consecutive text blocks\n\n for (const block of content) {\n if (block.type === \"text\") {\n const text = block.text as string | undefined\n if (text) {\n textBuffer += text\n }\n } else if (block.type === \"tool_use\") {\n // Flush accumulated text before processing tool\n if (textBuffer) {\n blocks.push({ type: \"text\", content: textBuffer, id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}` })\n textBuffer = \"\"\n }\n const input = block.input as Record<string, unknown> | undefined\n const name = block.name as string\n\n if (name === \"Read\") {\n const filePath = input?.file_path as string | undefined\n if (filePath) {\n blocks.push({\n type: \"tool\",\n name: \"Read\",\n arg: rel(filePath),\n id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n })\n }\n } else if (name === \"Edit\" || name === \"Write\") {\n const filePath = input?.file_path as string | undefined\n if (filePath) {\n blocks.push({\n type: \"tool\",\n name,\n arg: rel(filePath),\n id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n })\n }\n } else if (name === \"Bash\") {\n const command = input?.command as string | undefined\n if (command) {\n blocks.push({\n type: \"tool\",\n name: \"$\",\n            arg: shortenTempPaths(command),\n            id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n          })\n        }\n      } else if (name === \"Grep\") {\n        const pattern = input?.pattern as string | undefined\n        const path = input?.path as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"Grep\",\n          arg: `${pattern}${path ? ` in ${rel(path)}` : \"\"}`,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"Glob\") {\n        const pattern = input?.pattern as string | undefined\n        const path = input?.path as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"Glob\",\n          arg: `${pattern}${path ? ` in ${rel(path)}` : \"\"}`,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"TodoWrite\") {\n        const todos = input?.todos as Array<{ content: string; status: string }> | undefined\n        if (todos?.length) {\n          const summary = todos\n            .map(\n              t =>\n                `[${\n t.status === \"completed\" ?       "content": "import { rel } from \"../lib/rel.js\"\nimport { shortenTempPaths } from \"../lib/shortenTempPaths.js\"\n\nexport type ContentBlock =\n  | { type: \"text\"; content: string; id: string }\n  | { type: \"tool\"; name: string; arg?: string; id: string }\n\nexport const eventToBlocks = (event: Record<string, unknown>): ContentBlock[] => {\n  if (event.type !== \"assistant\") {\n    return []\n  }\n\n  const message = event.message as Record<string, unknown> | undefined\n  const content = message?.content as Array<Record<string, unknown>> | undefined\n\n  if (!content) {\n    return []\n  }\n\n  const blocks: ContentBlock[] = []\n  const messageId = (message?.id as string | undefined) ?? \"unknown\"\n  let blockIndex = 0\n\n  let textBuffer = \"\" // Accumulate consecutive text blocks\n\n  for (const block of content) {\n    if (block.type === \"text\") {\n      const text = block.text as string | undefined\n      if (text) {\n        textBuffer += text\n      }\n    } else if (block.type === \"tool_use\") {\n      // Flush accumulated text before processing tool\n      if (textBuffer) {\n        blocks.push({ type: \"text\", content: textBuffer, id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}` })\n        textBuffer = \"\"\n      }\n      const input = block.input as Record<string, unknown> | undefined\n      const name = block.name as string\n\n      if (name === \"Read\") {\n        const filePath = input?.file_path as string | undefined\n        if (filePath) {\n          blocks.push({\n            type: \"tool\",\n            name: \"Read\",\n            arg: rel(filePath),\n            id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n          })\n        }\n      } else if (name === \"Edit\" || name === \"Write\") {\n        const filePath = input?.file_path as string | undefined\n        if (filePath) {\n          blocks.push({\n            type: \"tool\",\n            name,\n            arg: rel(filePath),\n            id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n          })\n        }\n      } else if (name === \"Bash\") {\n        const command = input?.command as string | undefined\n        if (command) {\n          blocks.push({\n            type: \"tool\",\n            name: \"$\",\n arg: shortenTempPaths(command),\n id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n })\n }\n } else if (name === \"Grep\") {\n const pattern = input?.pattern as string | undefined\n const path = input?.path as string | undefined\n blocks.push({\n type: \"tool\",\n name: \"Grep\",\n arg: `${pattern}${path ? ` in ${rel(path)}` : \"\"}`,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"Glob\") {\n        const pattern = input?.pattern as string | undefined\n        const path = input?.path as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"Glob\",\n          arg: `${pattern}${path ? ` in ${rel(path)}` : \"\"}`,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"TodoWrite\") {\n        const todos = input?.todos as Array<{ content: string; status: string }> | undefined\n        if (todos?.length) {\n          const summary = todos\n            .map(\n              t =>\n                `[${\n t.status === \"completed\" ? \"x\"\n : t.status === \"in_progress\" ? \"~\"\n : \" \"\n }] ${t.content}`,\n            )\n            .join(\"\\n    \")\n          blocks.push({\n            type: \"tool\",\n            name: \"TodoWrite\",\n            arg: \"\\n    \" + summary,\n            id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n          })\n        } else {\n          blocks.push({ type: \"tool\", name: \"TodoWrite\", id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}` })\n        }\n      } else if (name === \"WebFetch\") {\n        const url = input?.url as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"WebFetch\",\n          arg: url,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"WebSearch\") {\n        const query = input?.query as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"WebSearch\",\n          arg: query,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"Task\") {\n        const description = input?.description as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"Task\",\n          arg: description,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"Skill\") {\n        const skill = input?.skill as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({ type: \"tool\", name: \"Skill\", arg: skill, id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}` })\n      }\n    }\n  }\n\n  // Flush any remaining text at the end\n  if (textBuffer) {\n    blocks.push({ type: \"text\", content: textBuffer, id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}` })\n }\n\n return blocks\n}\n",

\"\"\n // Should only see one instance of each tool\n expect(output.match(/Read/g)?.length).toBe(1)\n expect(output.match(/Edit/g)?.length).toBe(1)\n })\n })\n\n it(\"merges consecutive text blocks to prevent unwanted gaps\", async () => {\n // When Claude outputs text in multiple blocks (e.g., before and after inline code),\n // we should merge them into one StreamingText component to avoid gaps\n const events = [\n {\n type: \"assistant\",\n message: {\n id: \"msg_123\",\n content: [\n { type: \"text\", text: \"Use the \" },\n { type: \"text\", text: \"`console.log()`\" },\n { type: \"text\", text: \" function to debug.\" },\n ],\n },\n },\n ]\n\n const { lastFrame } = render(<EventDisplay events={events} />)\n\n await vi.waitFor(() => {\n const output = lastFrame() ?? "originalFile": "import { rel } from \"../lib/rel.js\"\nimport { shortenTempPaths } from \"../lib/shortenTempPaths.js\"\n\nexport type ContentBlock =\n | { type: \"text\"; content: string; id: string }\n | { type: \"tool\"; name: string; arg?: string; id: string }\n\nexport const eventToBlocks = (event: Record<string, unknown>): ContentBlock[] => {\n if (event.type !== \"assistant\") {\n return []\n }\n\n const message = event.message as Record<string, unknown> | undefined\n const content = message?.content as Array<Record<string, unknown>> | undefined\n\n if (!content) {\n return []\n }\n\n const blocks: ContentBlock[] = []\n const messageId = (message?.id as string | undefined) ?? \"unknown\"\n let blockIndex = 0\n\n let textBuffer = \"\" // Accumulate consecutive text blocks\n\n for (const block of content) {\n if (block.type === \"text\") {\n const text = block.text as string | undefined\n if (text) {\n textBuffer += text\n }\n } else if (block.type === \"tool_use\") {\n // Flush accumulated text before processing tool\n if (textBuffer) {\n blocks.push({ type: \"text\", content: textBuffer, id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}` })\n textBuffer = \"\"\n }\n const input = block.input as Record<string, unknown> | undefined\n const name = block.name as string\n\n if (name === \"Read\") {\n const filePath = input?.file_path as string | undefined\n if (filePath) {\n blocks.push({\n type: \"tool\",\n name: \"Read\",\n arg: rel(filePath),\n id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n })\n }\n } else if (name === \"Edit\" || name === \"Write\") {\n const filePath = input?.file_path as string | undefined\n if (filePath) {\n blocks.push({\n type: \"tool\",\n name,\n arg: rel(filePath),\n id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n })\n }\n } else if (name === \"Bash\") {\n const command = input?.command as string | undefined\n if (command) {\n blocks.push({\n type: \"tool\",\n name: \"$\",\n            arg: shortenTempPaths(command),\n            id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n          })\n        }\n      } else if (name === \"Grep\") {\n        const pattern = input?.pattern as string | undefined\n        const path = input?.path as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"Grep\",\n          arg: `${pattern}${path ? ` in ${rel(path)}` : \"\"}`,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"Glob\") {\n        const pattern = input?.pattern as string | undefined\n        const path = input?.path as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"Glob\",\n          arg: `${pattern}${path ? \"unknown\"\n let blockIndex = 0\n\n let textBuffer = \"\" // Accumulate consecutive text blocks\n\n console.log(\"eventToBlocks content:\", JSON.stringify(content, null, 2))\n for (const block of content) {\n if (block.type === \"text\") {\n const text = block.text as string | undefined\n if (text) {\n textBuffer += text\n }\n } else if (block.type === \"tool_use\") {\n // Flush accumulated text before processing tool\n if (textBuffer) {\n blocks.push({ type: \"text\", content: textBuffer, id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}` })\n textBuffer = \"\"\n }\n const input = block.input as Record<string, unknown> | undefined\n const name = block.name as string\n\n if (name === \"Read\") {\n const filePath = input?.file_path as string | undefined\n if (filePath) {\n blocks.push({\n type: \"tool\",\n name: \"Read\",\n arg: rel(filePath),\n id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n })\n }\n } else if (name === \"Edit\" || name === \"Write\") {\n const filePath = input?.file_path as string | undefined\n if (filePath) {\n blocks.push({\n type: \"tool\",\n name,\n arg: rel(filePath),\n id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n })\n }\n } else if (name === \"Bash\") {\n const command = input?.command as string | undefined\n if (command) {\n blocks.push({\n type: \"tool\",\n name: \"$\",\n            arg: shortenTempPaths(command),\n            id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n          })\n        }\n      } else if (name === \"Grep\") {\n        const pattern = input?.pattern as string | undefined\n        const path = input?.path as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"Grep\",\n          arg: `${pattern}${path ? ` in ${rel(path)}` : \"\"}`,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"Glob\") {\n        const pattern = input?.pattern as string | undefined\n        const path = input?.path as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"Glob\",\n          arg: `${pattern}${path ? ` in ${rel(path)}` : \"\"}`,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"TodoWrite\") {\n        const todos = input?.todos as Array<{ content: string; status: string }> | undefined\n        if (todos?.length) {\n          const summary = todos\n            .map(\n              t =>\n                `[${\n t.status === \"completed\" ? \"x\"\n : t.status === \"in_progress\" ? \"~\"\n : \" \"\n }] ${t.content}`,\n            )\n            .join(\"\\n    \")\n          blocks.push({\n            type: \"tool\",\n            name: \"TodoWrite\",\n            arg: \"\\n    \" + summary,\n            id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n          })\n        } else {\n          blocks.push({ type: \"tool\", name: \"TodoWrite\", id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}` })\n        }\n      } else if (name === \"WebFetch\") {\n        const url = input?.url as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"WebFetch\",\n          arg: url,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"WebSearch\") {\n        const query = input?.query as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"WebSearch\",\n          arg: query,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"Task\") {\n        const description = input?.description as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"Task\",\n          arg: description,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"Skill\") {\n        const skill = input?.skill as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({ type: \"tool\", name: \"Skill\", arg: skill, id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}` })\n      }\n    }\n  }\n\n  // Flush any remaining text at the end\n  if (textBuffer) {\n    blocks.push({ type: \"text\", content: textBuffer, id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}` })\n }\n\n return blocks\n}\n",

\"unknown\"\n let blockIndex = 0\n\n let textBuffer = \"\" // Accumulate consecutive text blocks\n\n console.log(\"eventToBlocks content:\", JSON.stringify(content, null, 2))\n for (const block of content) {\n if (block.type === \"text\") {\n const text = block.text as string | undefined\n if (text) {\n textBuffer += text\n console.log(\"Added to textBuffer:\", text, \"-> buffer now:\", textBuffer)\n }\n } else if (block.type === \"tool_use\") {\n // Flush accumulated text before processing tool\n if (textBuffer) {\n blocks.push({ type: \"text\", content: textBuffer, id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}` })\n textBuffer = \"\"\n }\n const input = block.input as Record<string, unknown> | undefined\n const name = block.name as string\n\n if (name === \"Read\") {\n const filePath = input?.file_path as string | undefined\n if (filePath) {\n blocks.push({\n type: \"tool\",\n name: \"Read\",\n arg: rel(filePath),\n id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n })\n }\n } else if (name === \"Edit\" || name === \"Write\") {\n const filePath = input?.file_path as string | undefined\n if (filePath) {\n blocks.push({\n type: \"tool\",\n name,\n arg: rel(filePath),\n id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n })\n }\n } else if (name === \"Bash\") {\n const command = input?.command as string | undefined\n if (command) {\n blocks.push({\n type: \"tool\",\n name: \"$\",\n            arg: shortenTempPaths(command),\n            id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n          })\n        }\n      } else if (name === \"Grep\") {\n        const pattern = input?.pattern as string | undefined\n        const path = input?.path as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"Grep\",\n          arg: `${pattern}${path ? ` in ${rel(path)}` : \"\"}`,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"Glob\") {\n        const pattern = input?.pattern as string | undefined\n        const path = input?.path as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"Glob\",\n          arg: `${pattern}${path ? {
"type": "text",
"text": "EXCELLENT! The merging IS working correctly:\n- eventToBlocks returns: `[{ \"type\": \"text\", \"content\": \"Use the `console.log()` function to debug.\", \"id\": \"msg_123-0\" }]`\n\nBut the output is still: `\"Use the\\n\\nconsole.log()\\n\\n function to debug.\"`\n\nThis means the problem is in how `StreamingText` is rendering! The backticks in the merged text are being split up by `StreamingText`'s markdown processing. Let me check the `StreamingText` component logic again - it must be detecting the backticks and rendering them as separate Text components, and those are getting newlines between them!\n\nOh wait, I see it now! Look at EventDisplay:69-76:\n\n`tsx\n<Box flexDirection=\"column\" gap={1}>\n  {contentBlocks.map(block =>\n    block.type === \"text\" ?\n      <StreamingText key={block.id} content={block.content} />\n    : <ToolUse key={block.id} name={block.name} arg={block.arg} />,\n  )}\n</Box>\n`\n\nThe Box has `gap={1}`, which adds gaps between CHILDREN. StreamingText renders multiple `<Text>` components (one for each formatted segment), and those become CHILDREN of the parent, not siblings. Wait, no - StreamingText returns a fragment `<>...</>` containing multiple Text components.\n\nActually, I think the issue is that Ink is rendering the separate Text components with gaps. Let me check StreamingText more carefully - it returns a fragment with separate Text components. Those Text components might be getting wrapped or treated differently by Ink.\n\nActually, I think the real fix is to render StreamingText as inline, not in a column layout. But wait, the Box flexDirection=\"column\" affects the layout of contentBlocks (Text vs ToolUse), not the internal layout of StreamingText.\n\nLet me check if the problem is in how `StreamingText` uses fragments. When you return a fragment with multiple `<Text>` components in Ink, they might be rendered on separate lines. Let me check:"
}

\"unknown\"\n let blockIndex = 0\n\n let textBuffer = \"\" // Accumulate consecutive text blocks\n\n for (const block of content) {\n if (block.type === \"text\") {\n const text = block.text as string | undefined\n if (text) {\n textBuffer += text\n }\n } else if (block.type === \"tool_use\") {\n // Flush accumulated text before processing tool\n if (textBuffer) {\n blocks.push({ type: \"text\", content: textBuffer, id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}` })\n textBuffer = \"\"\n }\n const input = block.input as Record<string, unknown> | undefined\n const name = block.name as string\n\n if (name === \"Read\") {\n const filePath = input?.file_path as string | undefined\n if (filePath) {\n blocks.push({\n type: \"tool\",\n name: \"Read\",\n arg: rel(filePath),\n id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n })\n }\n } else if (name === \"Edit\" || name === \"Write\") {\n const filePath = input?.file_path as string | undefined\n if (filePath) {\n blocks.push({\n type: \"tool\",\n name,\n arg: rel(filePath),\n id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n })\n }\n } else if (name === \"Bash\") {\n const command = input?.command as string | undefined\n if (command) {\n blocks.push({\n type: \"tool\",\n name: \"$\",\n            arg: shortenTempPaths(command),\n            id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n          })\n        }\n      } else if (name === \"Grep\") {\n        const pattern = input?.pattern as string | undefined\n        const path = input?.path as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"Grep\",\n          arg: `${pattern}${path ? ` in ${rel(path)}` : \"\"}`,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"Glob\") {\n        const pattern = input?.pattern as string | undefined\n        const path = input?.path as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"Glob\",\n          arg: `${pattern}${path ? ` in ${rel(path)}` : \"\"}`,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"TodoWrite\") {\n        const todos = input?.todos as Array<{ content: string; status: string }> | undefined\n        if (todos?.length) {\n          const summary = todos\n            .map(\n              t =>\n                `[${\n t.status === \"completed\" ? \"x\"\n : t.status === \"in_progress\" ? \"~\"\n : \" \"\n }] ${t.content}`,\n            )\n            .join(\"\\n    \")\n          blocks.push({\n            type: \"tool\",\n            name: \"TodoWrite\",\n            arg: \"\\n    \" + summary,\n            id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n          })\n        } else {\n          blocks.push({ type: \"tool\", name: \"TodoWrite\", id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}` })\n        }\n      } else if (name === \"WebFetch\") {\n        const url = input?.url as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"WebFetch\",\n          arg: url,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"WebSearch\") {\n        const query = input?.query as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"WebSearch\",\n          arg: query,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"Task\") {\n        const description = input?.description as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({\n          type: \"tool\",\n          name: \"Task\",\n          arg: description,\n          id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}`,\n        })\n      } else if (name === \"Skill\") {\n        const skill = input?.skill as string | undefined\n        blocks.push({ type: \"tool\", name: \"Skill\", arg: skill, id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}` })\n      }\n    }\n  }\n\n  // Flush any remaining text at the end\n  if (textBuffer) {\n    console.log(\"Flushing remaining textBuffer:\", textBuffer)\n    blocks.push({ type: \"text\", content: textBuffer, id: `${messageId}-${blockIndex++}` })\n  }\n\n  console.log(\"eventToBlocks returning:\", JSON.stringify(blocks, null, 2))\n  return blocks\n}\n",
